title: Trump administration to publish proposed rule changes for gun exports - official
text:
The Trump administration is preparing to publish on Thursday long-delayed proposed rule changes for the export of U.S. firearms, a State Department official said on Tuesday.
U.S. President Donald Trump gestures as he welcomes South Korea's President Moon Jae-In in the Oval Office of the White House in Washington, U.S., May 22, 2018. REUTERS/Kevin Lamarque The rule changes would move the oversight of commercial firearm exports from the U.S. Department of State to the Department of Commerce.
The action is part of a broader Trump administration overhaul of weapons export policy that was announced in April.
Reporting by Mike Stone
